title: Online Education Based on Deliberate Practice and Mental Practice for Acquiring Surgical Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Standardized competency-based education for improving surgical skills provided to practitioners working in medical device companies

learning_goals: Learners systematically practice from basic suturing skills to advanced surgical procedures according to the three-stage motor skill acquisition model (Fitts & Posner).
Learners improve cognitive and motor coordination by reproducing surgical procedures in a non-real-time environment using a mental practice simulation tool at least three times a week.
Learners demonstrate a 25% improvement in surgical skill proficiency through peer feedback systems and project-based assessments.

resources: Online discussion forums and feedback system

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
